title: US Stocks Close Flat While Earnings Views Are ‘Ratcheted’ Higher
description: The S&P 500 Index closed little changed on Tuesday, with tech megacaps mixed. Volume trailed the 20-day average by around 44%, following Monday’s roughly 40% drop.
content: The S&P 500 Index closed little changed on Tuesday, with tech megacaps mixed. Volume trailed the 20-day average by around 44%, following Monday’s roughly 40% drop.
